title: A1 - ENV + HTML
description: You will install the development environment for creating Web applications and create a webpage with HTML.

title: A2 - CSS + BOOTSTRAP
description: You will enhance the visuals on the webpage with CSS and Bootstrap.

title: A3 - JS + REACT
description: You will enhance the functionality of your webpage with JS and React.
